title: Zambia’s De-Dollarization Effort Gives Fresh Impetus to Kwacha Rally
description: Zambia’s kwacha traded near the highest in more than two years, as a government order to curb the use of foreign currencies in domestic transactions prompted traders to sell the greenback.
content: Zambia’s kwacha traded near the highest in more than two years, as a government order to curb the use of foreign currencies in domestic transactions prompted traders to sell the greenback.
